code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const userInfo=localStorage.getItem('userInfo');if(userInfo){const{token}=JSON.parse(userInfo);config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
